name: 王謹誠
objective:
本課程在應用計算方法來解決工程問題，重點將放在理解各種數值方法背後的基本概念。
This course is to teach you how to apply computational methodologies to solve engineering problems when no analytical solution exists. Emphasis will be placed on understanding the basic concepts behind the various numerical methods.
